page.title: 09Books
page.content:
My father, who is a teacher of history, tells me that when he was young he was always reading a book. He certainly reads a lot today! My mum also reads a lot, so I have been brought up to read and enjoy books, but a lot of my friends hardly ever seem to read. I decided to find out just how many children of my age read books:
100% have read at least one book 14% are always reading a book 21% regularly read books (more than one a month) 46% read books occasionally (between 3-12 books a year) 19% hardly ever read books (less than 2-3 books a year)
